step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, try to keep your elbows straighter when reaching overhead. Also, focus on opening your fingers wider.
In step 2, aim for a more controlled movement. Ensure your arms are fully extended overhead and your fingers are spread wide as you exhale.
During step 3, focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together more firmly. Try to keep your elbows straighter as you make a fist and push down.
For step 4, ensure your arms are fully stretched back overhead. Relax your muscles and take a full breath out.
Step 5 seems to be a repeat of step 1. Please ensure you are following the distinct steps of the exercise. Focus on opening your fingers wide and keeping elbows straighter.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to really stretch your arms overhead and open your fingers wide. When you push down, squeeze your shoulder blades together and keep your arms straight.
